Windlord::

Windlord heard Teltoli's questions and he just could confort 
her "Don't worry, Mylady, all will be Ok... I promise you"

But he didn't sure about it then se saw at Aerotaur and Angel Prime, 
he felt that Angel Prime put him that engine and it increased his 
speed. His circuits advice him about the missiles and following his 
favorite strategy he used his enemies shot to destroy them.

The male Hwak flew trying to avoid enemies and their shots.
Windlord saw the CibertronFire and he opened his com link and 
spoke "Windlord to Cibertronian Fire...  Be ready to recive a hurted 
MAximal... I'll try to land in few cycles"

Windlord opened his comlink to Aerotaur "Aerotaur... Here's Windlord, 
I know that it could sound insane but it's not necesary that you stay 
here, it's not necesary that you fight in this war... You haven't 
faction and I'm neutral too, but my honor doesn't let me left them 
this time where they need help... and the other will need you 
protection. I don't sure if I'm Maximal or not but I haven't election 
now."
